data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Shantou, Guangdong, China to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Shantou, Guangdong, China
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the county of Shantou, Guangdong, China who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.section_summary: On average, 7 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Shantou, Guangdong, China.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.

Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Shantou, Guangdong, China to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of Shantou, Guangdong, China.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Lakkia people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the county of Shantou to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: the county of Shantou has (about) 429,374 people who know Jesus, 91,437 people who know about him culturally, and 5,139,189 people who are far from Jesus.
Over 90.8 percent of the people of Shantou are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!

location.name: Shantou
